title: Healthy back - perfect posture
summary: Keep your back healthy and build your perfect posture.
description: The best application that helps you to have a correct posture. Keeps your back straight and healthy.All you need is to put your phone with our application in your breast pocket. You will get a vibration and sound signal when your back is in an incorrect position. With our application you will be able to:- Develop and keep the correct and healthy posture- Reduce back and neck pain- Stop development of back diseasesMain features:- Get notification when your back is in an unhealthy- Control your posture- Simple to setup, adjust and use- No additional hardware- Only your smartphone is required- Get notification on your smartwatch
descriptionHTML:
The best application that helps you to have a correct posture. Keeps your back straight and healthy.
All you need is to put your phone with our application in your breast pocket. You will get a vibration and sound signal when your back is in an incorrect position.

With our application you will be able to:
- Develop and keep the correct and healthy posture
- Reduce back and neck pain
- Stop development of back diseases

Main features:
- Get notification when your back is in an unhealthy
- Control your posture
- Simple to setup, adjust and use
- No additional hardware
- Only your smartphone is required
- Get notification on your smartwatch
comments: Great app! Helped me with my posture. Excellent!
recentChanges: Improve stability of app when screen is off
